msg: Putting Morris Kwan's name by some of the JAXP 1.3 line items

author: minchau
msg: Fix for XALANJ-2109 applied (we won't \n to \r\n in an HTML attribute value on
Windows OS anymore, it will be left as is during serialization).

author: santiagopg
msg: Clear XML reader for the case in which them main stylesheet is passed using a DOMSource. This fixes the problem of trying to use a DOM2SAX reader for included/imported stylesheets that are resolved by user-defined URI resovers.
